p: As depicted in Fig. 5c, the mice in the VLP-induced immune sera, VLP + alum-induced immune sera, and ZKA190 mAb groups were significantly protected against mortality relative to the Alum ( p = 0.0015) and Naïve control ( p = 0.0021) groups. All mice in the Alum only and Naïve groups succumbed to infection by Day 16. Partial protection was afforded in the VLP (1:5 diluted sera transfer) group where only 2 of 5 mice survived. Similarly, only 2 mice survived in the VLP + alum (1:5 diluted sera transfer) group.
